lyrics:
[Intro: Timbaland]
Yeah, ha, here we go, like that, oh
Yeah, ha, here we go, like that, uh, ha
Yeah, ha, here we go, like that, uh, ha
Yeah, ha, Aaliyah, sing

[Verse 1]
If your girl only knew
That you was tryin' to get with me (What would she do?)
If your girl only knew
That you was dissin' her to talk to me

[Chorus]
She would probably leave you alone (She would probably leave you alone)
She would probably curse you out and unplug her phone (Out)
I bet she'd be glad that you was gone (Oh yeah, you was gone)
And then she wouldn't have to worry (No)

[Verse 2]
If your girl only knew
That I would want to kick it wit' you (If she knew)
And if your girl could only see
How you be callin' me, gettin' fresh with me

[Chorus]
She would probably leave you alone (She'd probably leave you, you alone)
She would probably curse you out and unplug her phone (Unplug her phone)
I bet she'd be glad that you was gone (She'll be glad that you is gone)
And then she wouldn't have to worry (Uh, mm-mm)
[Bridge]
She's crazy to put up wit' you (Hey)
But, boy, I won't be no fool (Won't be no fool)
Let you like what you see (Oh)
It ain't easy to get with me (No, baby)
Girl, it's dumb to put up wit' you (With you)
But, boy, I won't be no fool (Won't be no fool)
Let you like what you see (Oh, yeah)
It ain't easy to get with me

[Chorus]
She would probably leave you alone (Alone)
She would probably curse you out and unplug her phone (Mm-mm)
I bet she'd be glad that you was gone (She'd be glad that you was gone)
And then she wouldn't have to worry (Yeah, mm-mm)
She would probably leave you alone (Leave you alone)
She would probably curse you out and unplug her phone (Oh, oh-whoa oh)
I bet she'd be glad that you was gone (Baby, oh yeah, that you was gone)
And then she wouldn't have to worry (Mm-mm)
She would probably leave you alone
(If your girl only knew)
She would probably curse you out and unplug her phone (Mm-mm)
I bet she'd be glad that you was gone
(If your girl only knew)
And then she wouldn't have to worry (Mm-mm)
[Outro: Timbaland & Aaliyah]
If your girl only knew, knew
What you sayin', what you sayin', what you sayin', uh?
What you sayin', what you sayin', what you sayin', uh?
What you sayin', what you sayin', uh?
If your girl only knew, knew
What you sayin', what you sayin', what you sayin', uh?
What you sayin', what you sayin', what you sayin', uh?
What you sayin', uh? Check it
If your girl only knew, knew
What you sayin', what you sayin', what you sayin', uh?
What you sayin', what you sayin', what you sayin', uh?
You ain't sayin' nothin', baby, check it
If your girl only knew
What you sayin', what you sayin', what you sayin', uh?
What you sayin', what you sayin', what you sayin', uh?
You ain't sayin' nothin', baby, uh
Like that, ha
You ain't sayin' nothin', baby, ha
Let the music ride, uh
Let's take a walk down with me, baby, uh
Can you feel me, can you feel me? Word
Timbaland, one mo' 'gain, uh
Blackground, check it
